response.overview: The market age has begun, and people's lives are all in a frenzy. Saihnaa, who has a confident goal of trading and making money at this time, mortgages her apartment and leaves her son with a friend. While she is abroad for a long time, her husband Hurle has an accident and is hospitalized. No one will come back. Once she became bedridden, Doljin, a cleaning lady who was born mute, took care of her. El girl has a son named Nameless, and his friend is Bold, son of Khurlee. But Doljing's son, Nameless, said to his friend, "I found my father," and when he looked through the hospital window to get his father out, it was Bold's father. Due to this, the film shows how the fate of children changes, and then tells the story of the lives of disabled people.
response.title: A world that does not happen by will
